title: Hello there 👋
description: I am a person who likes a lot of video games, technologies, sports, and nature. My main premise is 'laughing is the most important thing and makes you lose weight' 😆. As a professional, I am enthusiastic about web technologies this is my main drive. I have been working in web applications with a frontend engineer in this environment for the last few years and have been really a challenge and motivator.
